name: The Purest Salad (Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Cabbage and Pine Nuts)
source_file: Brussels Sprouts Cabbage Salad with Pine Nuts.txt
description: A warm salad of roasted Brussels sprouts with thinly sliced red cabbage, toasted pine nuts, and crispy garlic in a honey-mustard dressing.
ingredients: 6 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 1/2 lb red cabbage, sliced very thin
instructions: Preheat oven to 450Â°F. Spread pine nuts in a pie plate and toast about 3 minutes until golden brown.
Toss Brussels sprouts with 1 tablespoon oil on a baking sheet, season with salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes until caramelized and slightly tender.
In a small bowl, whisk lemon juice with honey, mustard, cayenne and chile powder. Slowly whisk in 1/4 cup olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
In a large bowl, toss cabbage with toasted pine nuts.
In a small skillet, heat remaining olive oil. Add garlic and cook over moderate heat until golden, about 1 minute. Scrape garlic and hot oil over cabbage.
Add Brussels sprouts and toss, then add dressing and toss again.
Scatter cheese shavings over top and serve right away.
